meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Danny Shapiro Michele Barkalow Steve Robin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1434.

td.p: Danny Shapiro, a gynecologist originally from Miami, Florida
Michele Barkalow, a physical therapist from Doylestown, Pennsylvania
Steve Robin, a marketing director from Scottsdale, Arizona (whose 2-day cash winnings total $16,100)

tr.td: GIRLS IN SONG
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
ODD JOBS
3-LETTER WORDS
INDIANS
THANKSGIVING
